title: Can Kuss Defend His Vuelta Crown Racing Against Ex-Teammate Roglič? ‘We’re Now Competitors’
content:
Kuss insists there's no bad blood with Roglič now racing on rival Red Bull-Bora-Hansgrohe: 'It's a good relationship.'

Read the full article at Can Kuss Defend His Vuelta Crown Racing Against Ex-Teammate Roglič? ‘We’re Now Competitors’ on Velo.
author: ahood
